verses.verse: And it came to pass<WH1961> in the eleventh<WH259> <WH6240> year,<WH8141> in the third<WH7992> month, in the first<WH259> day of the month,<WH2320> that the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> speak<WH559> unto<WH413> Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt,<WH4714> and to<WH413> his multitude;<WH1995> Whom<WH413> <WH4310> art thou like<WH1819> in thy greatness?<WH1433>

Behold, <WH2009> the Assyrian<WH804> was a cedar<WH730> in Lebanon<WH3844> with fair<WH3303> branches,<WH6057> and with a shadowing<WH6751> shroud,<WH2793> and of a high<WH1362> stature;<WH6967> and his top<WH6788> was<WH1961> among<WH996> the thick boughs.<WH5688>

The waters<WH4325> made him great,<WH1431> the deep<WH8415> set him up on high<WH7311> with<WH854> her rivers<WH5104> running<WH1980> round about<WH5439> his plants,<WH4302> and sent out<WH7971> her little rivers<WH8585> unto<WH413> all<WH3605> the trees<WH6086> of the field.<WH7704>

Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> his height<WH6967> was exalted<WH1361> above all<WH4480> <WH3605> the trees<WH6086> of the field,<WH7704> and his boughs<WH5634> were multiplied,<WH7235> and his branches<WH6288> became long<WH748> because of the multitude<WH7227> of waters,<WH4480> <WH4325> when he shot forth.<WH7971>

All <WH3605> the fowls<WH5775> of heaven<WH8064> made their nests<WH7077> in his boughs,<WH5589> and under<WH8478> his branches<WH6288> did all<WH3605> the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> bring forth their young,<WH3205> and under his shadow<WH6738> dwelt<WH3427> all<WH3605> great<WH7227> nations.<WH1471>
Thus was he fair<WH3302> in his greatness,<WH1433> in the length<WH753> of his branches:<WH1808> for<WH3588> his root<WH8328> was<WH1961> by<WH413> great<WH7227> waters.<WH4325>

The cedars<WH730> in the garden<WH1588> of God<WH430> could not<WH3808> hide<WH6004> him: the fir trees<WH1265> were not like<WH1819> <WH3808> <WH413> his boughs,<WH5589> and the chestnut trees<WH6196> were<WH1961> not<WH3808> like his branches;<WH6288> nor<WH3808> any<WH3605> tree<WH6086> in the garden<WH1588> of God<WH430> was like<WH1819> unto<WH413> him in his beauty.<WH3308>

I have made<WH6213> him fair<WH3303> by the multitude<WH7230> of his branches:<WH1808> so that all<WH3605> the trees<WH6086> of Eden,<WH5731> that<WH834> were in the garden<WH1588> of God,<WH430> envied<WH7065> him.

Therefore <WH3651> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Because<WH3282> <WH834> thou hast lifted up<WH1361> thyself in height,<WH6967> and he hath shot up<WH5414> his top<WH6788> among<WH413> <WH996> the thick boughs,<WH5688> and his heart<WH3824> is lifted up<WH7311> in his height;<WH1363>

I have therefore delivered<WH5414> him into the hand<WH3027> of the mighty one<WH352> of the heathen;<WH1471> he shall surely deal<WH6213> <WH6213> with him: I have driven him out<WH1644> for his wickedness.<WH7562>

And strangers,<WH2114> the terrible<WH6184> of the nations,<WH1471> have cut him off,<WH3772> and have left<WH5203> him: upon<WH413> the mountains<WH2022> and in all<WH3605> the valleys<WH1516> his branches<WH1808> are fallen,<WH5307> and his boughs<WH6288> are broken<WH7665> by all<WH3605> the rivers<WH650> of the land;<WH776> and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> of the earth<WH776> are gone down<WH3381> from his shadow,<WH4480> <WH6738> and have left<WH5203> him.

Upon <WH5921> his ruin<WH4658> shall all<WH3605> the fowls<WH5775> of the heaven<WH8064> remain,<WH7931> and all<WH3605> the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> shall be<WH1961> upon<WH413> his branches: <WH6288>

To the end<WH4616> that<WH834> none<WH3808> of all<WH3605> the trees<WH6086> by the waters<WH4325> exalt themselves<WH1361> for their height,<WH6967> neither<WH3808> shoot up<WH5414> <WH853> their top<WH6788> among<WH413> <WH996> the thick boughs,<WH5688> neither<WH3808> their trees<WH352> stand up<WH5975> in their height,<WH1363> all<WH3605> that drink<WH8354> water:<WH4325> for<WH3588> they are all<WH3605> delivered<WH5414> unto death,<WH4194> to<WH413> the nether parts<WH8482> of the earth,<WH776> in the midst<WH8432> of the children<WH1121> of men,<WH120> with<WH413> them that go down<WH3381> to the pit.<WH953>

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> In the day<WH3117> when he went down<WH3381> to the grave<WH7585> I caused a mourning:<WH56> I covered<WH3680> <WH853> the deep<WH8415> for<WH5921> him, and I restrained<WH4513> the floods<WH5104> thereof, and the great<WH7227> waters<WH4325> were stayed:<WH3607> and I caused Lebanon<WH3844> to mourn<WH6937> for<WH5921> him, and all<WH3605> the trees<WH6086> of the field<WH7704> fainted<WH5969> for<WH5921> him.

I made the nations<WH1471> to shake<WH7493> at the sound<WH4480> <WH6963> of his fall,<WH4658> when I cast him down<WH3381> <WH853> to hell<WH7585> with<WH854> them that descend<WH3381> into the pit:<WH953> and all<WH3605> the trees<WH6086> of Eden,<WH5731> the choice<WH4005> and best<WH2896> of Lebanon,<WH3844> all<WH3605> that drink<WH8354> water,<WH4325> shall be comforted<WH5162> in the nether parts<WH8482> of the earth.<WH776>

They <WH1992> also<WH1571> went down<WH3381> into hell<WH7585> with<WH854> him unto<WH413> them that be slain<WH2491> with the sword;<WH2719> and they that were his arm,<WH2220> that dwelt<WH3427> under his shadow<WH6738> in the midst<WH8432> of the heathen.<WH1471>

To <WH413> whom<WH4310> art thou thus like<WH1819> <WH3602> in glory<WH3519> and in greatness<WH1433> among the trees<WH6086> of Eden?<WH5731> yet shalt thou be brought down<WH3381> with<WH854> the trees<WH6086> of Eden<WH5731> unto<WH413> the nether parts<WH8482> of the earth:<WH776> thou shalt lie<WH7901> in the midst<WH8432> of the uncircumcised<WH6189> with<WH854> them that be slain<WH2491> by the sword.<WH2719> This<WH1931> is Pharaoh<WH6547> and all<WH3605> his multitude,<WH1995> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
